header.title: Global Setup Guide
header.description: Run custom code before all your tests start - perfect for preparing servers, databases, and test environments

whatIsGlobalSetup.title: What is Global Setup?
whatIsGlobalSetup.description: Global setup lets you prepare your test environment once before any tests run. Perfect for:

step1.title: Create global-setup.js
step1.description: Create a global-setup.js file in your project root:

step2.title: Configure Endorphin
step2.description: Tell Endorphin to use it in endorphin.config.ts:
step2.completionMessage: That's it! Your setup will run before tests start.

usingSetupData.title: Using Setup Data in Tests
usingSetupData.description: Access environment variables and data set during global setup

noTeardown.title: No Teardown Yet
noTeardown.description: Global teardown is not implemented yet. To clean up, use process event handlers, run cleanup scripts separately, or let CI/CD handle cleanup.

timing.title: Timing
details: If setup fails, tests won't run

troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting
troubleshooting.description: Common issues and how to fix them

fileNotFound.title: "Global setup file not found"
solutions: File path in config is correct

setupRunsButTestsDontSeeChanges.title: Setup Runs But Tests Don't See Changes
solutions: Use files or external storage for complex data

proTips.title: Pro Tips
tips: Keep it Simple - Don't overcomplicate setup
Log Progress - Help debug when things go wrong
Handle Errors - Fail gracefully with clear messages
Fast Setup - Don't slow down test starts

header.title: [FR] Global Setup Guide
header.description: [FR] Run custom code before all your tests start - perfect for preparing servers, databases, and test environments

whatIsGlobalSetup.title: [FR] What is Global Setup?
whatIsGlobalSetup.description: [FR] Global setup lets you prepare your test environment once before any tests run. Perfect for:

step1.title: [FR] Create global-setup.js
step1.description: [FR] Create a global-setup.js file in your project root:

step2.title: [FR] Configure Endorphin
step2.description: [FR] Tell Endorphin to use it in endorphin.config.ts:
step2.completionMessage: [FR] That's it! Your setup will run before tests start.

usingSetupData.title: [FR] Using Setup Data in Tests
usingSetupData.description: [FR] Access environment variables and data set during global setup

noTeardown.title: [FR] No Teardown Yet
noTeardown.description: [FR] Global teardown is not implemented yet. To clean up, use process event handlers, run cleanup scripts separately, or let CI/CD handle cleanup.

fileFormat.title: [FR] File Format
fileFormat.requirements: [FR] Must be JavaScript (.js) or TypeScript (.ts),Must export a default function,Function can be async

timing.title: [FR] Timing
timing.details: [FR] Runs once before all tests,If setup fails, tests won't run,No timeout limit (be reasonable!)

troubleshooting.title: [FR] Troubleshooting
troubleshooting.description: [FR] Common issues and how to fix them

fileNotFound.title: [FR] "Global setup file not found"
fileNotFound.solutions: [FR] File path in config is correct,File exists in project root,Path uses forward slashes (/)

setupRunsButTestsDontSeeChanges.title: [FR] Setup Runs But Tests Don't See Changes
setupRunsButTestsDontSeeChanges.solutions: [FR] Environment variables should work,Global variables might not persist,Use files or external storage for complex data

proTips.title: [FR] Pro Tips
proTips.tips: [FR] Keep it Simple - Don't overcomplicate setup,Log Progress - Help debug when things go wrong,Handle Errors - Fail gracefully with clear messages,Fast Setup - Don't slow down test starts
